name: Mega Man Battle Network 4.5: Real Operation (Wii U)
name_original: Mega Man Battle Network 4.5: Real Operation (Wii U)
description: Rockman EXE 4.5 Real Operation (ロックマンエグゼ4.5 リアルオペレーション) is a title in the Mega Man Battle Network sub-series of Mega Man video games. The game was released only in Japan on August 6, 2004, and is not part of the main Mega Man Battle Network storyline.
